pr_title: chore(datastore) Represent lastChangedAt as Temporal.Timestamp instead of long

timeline.message: chore(datastore) Represent lastChangedAt as Temporal.Timestamp instead of long

timeline.bodyText: Will this require the SQL table to be reprovisioned?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: ^If so, will this be considered a breaking change?
replies.author: raphkim

replies.bodyText: No, it will not require the SQL table to be reprovisioned, since it will still be stored as a Long either way.  That said, thanks for asking this question - I realized that the SQLiteModelFieldTypeConverter doesn't support AWSTimestamp yet, so I will add that.
replies.author: richardmcclellan

timeline.bodyText: Why not your cool Temporal.now(), in all places, instead?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: Oops, missed this one!  Will change.
replies.author: richardmcclellan

timeline.bodyText: You could make a Temporal.timestamp(long, TimeUnit) util, too, that might be cool.
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: Agreed, that would be nice.  Maybe in a subsequent PR.
replies.author: richardmcclellan

timeline.author: raphkim

timeline.bodyText: Just making sure: this change is scoped only to model metadata right? Codegen won't be affected?
timeline.author: raphkim

timeline.bodyText: We could potentially create Temporal.Timestamp.seconds(123_123L) and Temporal.Timestamp.milliseconds(123_123_000L) utility factories?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -53,12 +61,18 @@
                 .rating(3)
                 .id("83ceb757-c8c8-4b6a-bee0-a43afb53a73a")
                 .build(),
-            new ModelMetadata("83ceb757-c8c8-4b6a-bee0-a43afb53a73a", null, 5, 123123L)
+            new ModelMetadata("83ceb757-c8c8-4b6a-bee0-a43afb53a73a",
+                    null,
+                    5,
+                    new Temporal.Timestamp(123123L, TimeUnit.SECONDS))
         );
     public static final ModelWithMetadata<Post> DELETED_DRUM_POST =
         new ModelWithMetadata<>(
             DRUM_POST.getModel(),
-            new ModelMetadata("83ceb757-c8c8-4b6a-bee0-a43afb53a73a", Boolean.TRUE, 5, 123123L)
+            new ModelMetadata("83ceb757-c8c8-4b6a-bee0-a43afb53a73a",
+                    Boolean.TRUE,
+                    5,
+                    new Temporal.Timestamp(123123L, TimeUnit.SECONDS))
